item.title: Airframe Ultra public beta test set for January 10 to 13
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/airframe-ultra-public-beta-test-set-for-january-10-to-13

  • PC

Offline demo to follow after beta test closes.

Publisher Akupara Games and developer VIDEOCULT will host the first public beta test for battle racing game Airframe Ultra from January 10 to 13, the companies announced. Users can sign-up to participate via the Airframe Ultra Discord server until January 9 at 11:59 p.m. PT / January 10 at 2:59 a.m. ET.

For those who cannot participate in the beta test, an offline demo is also planned for release after the beta test closes. The full game is set to launch for PC via Steam sometime in 2025.

Here is an overview of the game, via Akupara Games:

About

Airframe Ultra is a fast-paced battle-racer where you compete with friends and foes in split-screen and online multiplayer. You can thrash with pipes, chains and plasma torches or leave them in the dust with boosts and pure white-knuckle cunning. Whatever it takes to win. So load up, make your racer, and settle things like a legend on the cracked asphalt streets of Megacity West!

Key Features

  • Hi octane.
  • Full throttle.
  • Make your race.
  • Clash with your crew.
  • Rule the streets.

Watch a new traler below.

The Hunt for Bandit 99

item.title: Marvel Rivals adds Fantastic Four on January 10
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/01/marvel-rivals-adds-fantastic-four-on-january-10

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Mister Fantastic, Invisible Woman, Human Torch, and The Thing

Marvel Rivals will add Fantastic Four’s Mister Fantastic, Invisible Woman, Human Torch, and The Thing with the launch of “Season 1: Eternal Night Falls” on January 10 at 1:00 a.m. PT / 4:00 a.m. ET, developer NetEase Games announced.

Here are the first details:

Darkness engulfs New York as the Timestream Entanglement leaves Doctor Strange trapped in the Entangled Astral Plane, scattering the Darkhold pages. Dracula and Doctor Doom disrupt the moon’s orbit, plunging the city into eternal night and unleashing an army of vampiric creatures. With the world on the brink, the Fantastic Four join forces with iconic Marvel heroes, standing together in the epic battle to break the mystical darkness with science. Ignite the battle against Dracula with the Fantastic Four in Marvel Rivals!

Marvel Rivals is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store.

Watch a new trailer below.

Season 1: Eternal Night Falls Trailer
